question: give me an itinerary from moving to another aparment i have several things here
answer:
1) Change address with post office 
2) Notify bank and utility companies of move 
3) Make a checklist of everything that needs to be packed 
4) Make sure all appliances (including air conditioner) are disconnected and ready to be moved 
5) Collect and return any keys or garage door openers 
6) Orchestrate the moving date 
7) Pack and label all fragile items 
8) Take photos of the current apartment (including fixtures and appliances) 
9) Clean the apartment before leaving 
10) Arrange furniture and appliances in the new apartment 
11) Change locks, if necessary 
12) Ensure all internet and cable services are connected 
13) Update new addresses in all documents, contacts, and social networks
